doctor.name: Dr. Sarwar Ibne Salam
doctor.info: Dr. Sarwar Ibne Salam is a Pediatric Orthopedic Surgeon in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, MS (ORTHO). He is a Assistant Professor, Pediatric Orthopedic at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Health and Hope Hospital. Practicing hour of Dr. Sarwar Ibne Salam at Health and Hope Hospital is 6pm to 9pm (Sun, Mon & Thu) & 4pm to 9pm (Tue).

doctor.name: Dr. Nripen Kumar Kundu
doctor.info: Dr. Nripen Kumar Kundu is a Orthopedic Surgeon in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Surgery), D-ORTHO, AO Trauma (BASIC). He is a Assistant Professor, Orthopedics at Popular Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi. Practicing hour of Dr. Nripen Kumar Kundu at Popular Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi is 7pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Rubaiath Tashfin
doctor.specialty: Paediatric Orthopaedic Surgery & Brachial Plexus Birth Palsy Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Rubaiath Tashfin is a highly skilled specialist in Pediatric Orthopedic Surgery and Brachial Plexus Birth Palsy. He holds an MBBS and an MS in Orthopedic Surgery, along with a Clinical Fellowship in Pediatric Orthopedic Surgery, with specialized training in Brachial Plexus Birth Palsy. Currently, he serves as a Consultant at Health and Hope Hospital in Dhaka. Dr. Tashfin practices at Health and Hope Hospital, located at 152/2/G, Green Road, Panthapath, Dhaka – 1205, where he is available for consultations from 5 PM to 8 PM, Sunday to Wednesday.
